item.description: Fresh off their Boston Music Awards prize for Best International Act -- Zili Misik is giving a FREE performance at the Beehive. I was at the Roxy for the award ceremony and Zili Misik (an all female ensemble filled with talent from the Berklee College of Music) turned in a great live set -- palpably raising the energy of the room and getting the crowd off their feet. You can come early and enjoy an early jazz set that starts at 6pm. Zili goes on at 10pm -- be ready to dance!!
item.name: ZILI MISIK (Roots music of the African Diaspora) - FREE at the Beehive!
